mapper.select:
select player.`player_id`, player.`player_tag`, player.`avatar`, player.`nation`, player.`region_id`, if (player.`main_character` is not null, player.`main_character`, player.`most_character`) as mainCharacter, if (player.`main_character_color` is not null, player.`main_character_color`, 0) as mainCharacterColor, cspr.`cspr` from player left join cspr on cspr.player_id = player.player_id where
player.`region_id` = #{regionId} and
cspr.`season` = #{season} and cspr.`ranking` is not null ORDER BY cspr.`ranking`
limit #{limit}
